name: Outdoor Patient Department (.net) - Pramod Mali
tagline: OPD stands for Outdoor Patient Department. It is the hardware including software system. It registers the patients’ details with their unique ID (i.e. token number) and displays the number to come to the next appointment to the doctor via Display (i.e. LCD). This system keeps the procedure of OPD patients’ appointment to the doctor much easier.
body:
### Welcome to Outdoor Patient Department.
 OPD stands for Outdoor Patient Department. It is the hardware including software system. It registers the patients’ details with their unique ID (i.e. token number) and displays the number to come to the next appointment to the doctor via Display (i.e. LCD). This system keeps the procedure of OPD patients’ appointment to the doctor much easier. 

### Authors and Contributors
